entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:06 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to a few flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
